Reviews.Title: “Brilliant location, top staff!”
Reviews.Author: goldilocks65
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 3 nights monday 16th april 2012 sixties seventies respectively location hotel fabulous piazza barberini short walk spanish steps trevi fountain particularly easy pleasant walking distance romes major tourist attractions nice day rained half time hotel staff extremely pleasant helpful humorous clean generous size free wifi ipad looked window onto via sistina flavour ambience rome thoroughly enjoyable stay couldnt wished value money contributed hugely roman holiday

Reviews.Title: “An excellent hotel !”
Reviews.Author: litalcrespin
Reviews.Content: staied king hotel 4 night wonderful king hotel hilton hotel clean staf nice help breakfast nice hotel 5 min walk spanish steps 10 mins walk fontana dei trevi walk attraction foot metro locted 3 min hotel time worth money enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a great price!”
Reviews.Author: Alex K
Reviews.Content: hotel located 2 blocks metro station central location easy access main hot spots staff friendly helpful speak languages bigger expected bigger italian hotels stayed pricier bathroom clean fresh towels daily tub spotless breakfast crossaints delicious highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “central location”
Reviews.Author: ValWeitz
Reviews.Content: visited rome holiday stayed 4 days hotel outdated chilly night heating rome doesnt cold wifi fifth floor directly router hotel staff friendly helpful getting minute dinner reservation decent priced restaurant continental breakfast cant beat location probably stay considering booked trip days wasnt bad stay

Reviews.Content: visited rome persons shared hotel king rome cold nights toilet window close bathroom ceiling covered black mould carpet stains location live hotel health risks hotel nearby

Reviews.Title: “Good price and great location”

Reviews.Content: trip rome didnt expectations except clean private bathroom sleep floor near front looked street complaints hotel king met expectations staff friendly helpful location perfect walking distance

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money”
Reviews.Author: charles_sidgwick
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel king 7 8 times past reasons value money situation quality staff hotel modernising annual basis seen bit comfortable clean welcoming theres ac excellent heating winter 2 minutes spanish steps barberini metro stop 10 minutes termini central accessible staff pleasant helpful comment extends porters kitchen staff chambermaids front desk staff hesitated reviewing hk dont rush seriously unless youre mega rich cant

Reviews.Title: “COULDN'T ASK FOR ANYTHING MORE!”

Reviews.Content: amazing location 5 15 minutes walking distance major sightseeing destinations comfortable clean airconditioned space hard affordable hotel hang breakfast included available lovely terrace sipping listening bells churches ringing start morning helpful friendly staff spoke english cant stay king hotel travelling 11 son perfect spot normal size rome standards clean comfortable breakfast perfect picky son able daily adventures foot hotel rest heading nice dinner son able sit lounge comfy couches watch movies laptop enjoyed view balcony sat relax rome busy quiet besides nice touch hotel deal location 5 mintues spanish steps trevi fountain 10 minutes pantheon piazza navona highly recommend hotel couples families individuals travelling offer thank staff fabulous stay seeing soon

Reviews.Content: location minutes spanish steps 10 minutes trevi fountain 3 2nd floor noise street bad bathroom black mold growing tiles water drain tub sheets clean beds comfortable desk personnel unfriendly breakfast nice rooftop terrace nice food breakfast typical cheese rolls boiled eggs

Reviews.Title: “Dirty hotel and what you pay is not worth it!”

Reviews.Content: stood hotel 2 nights beggining trip disappointing lights night tables terribly dirty curtains bathrooms dirty bath curtain 207 wood curtain windows stay

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Location, wonderful staff!”

Reviews.Content: amazing position hotel walk street top spanish steps couldnt believe trip rome happy wonderful staff lady front desk questions chance hotel bar night coffee nicest coffees plate home strudel lovely hotel takes elevators fantastic rome style cant wait

Reviews.Author: LilTink13
Reviews.Content: staff incredible start welcomed moment walked super friendly happy serve wealth information super internet bit spotty led frustrations planning walk five minutes hotel spot bummer stayed huge disappointment ive read renovated didnt renod mold caused husband stopped sore throats allergies getting sick couple days attribute hotel based timing bathroom grotty bed hear walls nonsmoking ashtrays thankfully didnt reek smoke air wonders cool frigid perfect sleeping snuggling loved located amazing location perfect walking distance main attractions breakfast mornings pretty decent im giving stars incredibly helpful friendly staff based 12 stars location definately five stars

Reviews.Title: “location location, no frills, very good value”

Reviews.Content: rome time rugby international quiet nice hotellocation excellent bottom street road metro line barberini 2 stops termini station main station trevi fountain doorstep literally maybe 10 min walk colosseum cobble stone streets wonderful areastaff found excellent spoke english barman flavio english quiet stay self service breakfeast continental style found excellenti eat cereal bread jams cheeses ham lot english channels easy guide 3rd floor dated smallbut cleanbed comfortable view rooftops buildings wasnt rome look clean dated shower found electric heating adjust frills location winner loads shopping aroundi solo travel ere parents hesitation advice wear comfortable footwear rome

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful, caring staff and warm hospitable atmosphere in a highly desirable location!”
Reviews.Author: maryinsf
Reviews.Content: extended family seven ranging ages 15 84 stayed hotel king december january blast definitely stay hotel hospitable caring spirit staff interacted incredibly cordial accommodating particularly flavio bartender porters front desk personnel friendly efficient ladies collective motor breakfast location cant beat virtually steps spanish steps house barberini metro stop easy walking distance trevi fountain numerous sights ive read hotel kings reviews tripadvisor hotels unfairly slammed instances look king hotel definitely budget accommodation dont stay obvious budget class hotel expecting five star experience thats please select numerous five star hotels neighborhood prefer economize cost hotel saved funds enjoying rome king hotel offers terrific deal beautiful historic highly desirable neighborhood attractive comfortable bar comfortable sitting furnished roomy chairs sofas flavio bar manager wonderful guy genial helpful little dog sweet shes bound smile actual hotel indeed simple american standards run bit dingy none 5 dirty bedrooms bathrooms cleaned day towels replaced bathrooms actually sparkling found breakfast abundant tasty guests choice fresh pastries breads cereal milk ham cheese various jams juice strong excellent coffee tea available considering complimentary breakfast offerings generous tasty cant awesome staff hotel king truly heart soul consider charming little heart rome

Reviews.Title: “Look for something else”

Reviews.Content: decided stay based location staying recommend dont tell drive hotel historical district okay walking luggage kids idea time cobweb enter bathroom enjoyed pubic hairs tube mold curtain bath floor free breakfast horrible bad coffee toaster cold

Reviews.Title: “awesome staff”

Reviews.Content: daughter travelled rome ten day stay king perfect didnt expect top line hotel staff king nice helpful front desk breakfast staff bartender basic front desk helpful giving directions recommendations evenings hotel bar meet guests talk bartender doll translating everyones languages keeping happy hotel bast sights shopping walked street spanish steps convenient town cost hotel rome king basic staff makes deal

Reviews.Title: “stay away”

Reviews.Content: booked 4 nights stayed couldnt wait cost 3 nights accommodation upgrade expensive worth stayed total damper stay walls moldy bed heads dirty carpet tired walls holes cracks toilet refilled 60 decibels king location plenty hotels spend extra elsewhere

Reviews.Content: rome spending 5 days king hotel looking worst shower shower curtain bed double queen matress awful breakfast poor coffee ok staff nice helpfull location

Reviews.Title: “The stay was alright but could find better for the same price.”

Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located near landmarks hotel updating method key attached hockey puck sized plastic piece key front desk safe basically wooden box lock key remains hotel staff safe needless locked luggage tv definitely basic ironing board breakfast basic rolls cold cereal american coffee juice basic offerings hotel nice rooftop drinks food breakfast lovely covered terrace available

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel - charming, clean & centrally located”

Reviews.Content: found hotel internet attracted cost location air conditioning august reasonably priced included continental breakfast staff helpful friendly polite reception staff spoke english hotel clean little fashioned added charm hotel cleaned thoroughly day including fresh bedding hotel perfectly located minutes walk top spanish steps recommend hotel rome staying time visit hopefully soon

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, friendly staff but old hotel and poor breakfast”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights location perfect near romes attractions easily walk spanish steps fontana di trevi colosseum zoo dissapointed breakfast believe photos breakfast posted hotels website breakfast included bread toasted 3 kinds pastries cornflakes tea coffee warm juice water
